text: Prosopocera myops is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Chevrolat in 1855. It is known from Nigeria, the Ivory Coast, the Republic of the Congo, the Democratic Republic of the Congo, and Sierra Leone.BioLib.cz - Prosopocera myops. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==Varietas== * Prosopocera myops var. dorsalis Chevrolat, 1858 * Prosopocera myops var. foxcrofti (Pascoe, 1864) ==References== Category:Prosopocerini Category:Beetles described in 1855
title: Prosopocera myops
